Banner.Description: I have 5 years of experience in developing technological solutions as Cloud Engineer, Data Engineer and Software Developer. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, Node.js, Python and sometimes in C++ while following good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a highly skilled computer scientist with 5 years of experience, I am dedicated to developing technological solutions that improve the digital world. With a passion for writing clean, reusable, and scalable code, I strive to always follow good practices and development standards.
Additionally, I have experience as a cloud engineer and data engineer, allowing me to not only create software solutions, but also set up and manage the infrastructure needed to support them.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software Developer & Application Specialist ServiceNow
Description: Software development in the ServiceNow environment for custom apps using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Requirement analysis through contact with stakeholders
Implementation and maintenance of server-side test automation
Ensuring code quality through code reviews

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data & Cloud Engineer
Description: Design System Architecture to connect individual components
Data scraping from different sources like APIs, databases and websites
Process data into common structures
Maintain code quality with code reviews
Set up and maintain the infrastructure in Oracle Cloud
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Treasury and Risk Management
Description: Developing of a Code Coverage Report Tool in ABAP
Test Automation with internal SAP Tools
Working in the SAP S4Finance department

Experience.Jobs.Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
Description: Developing of a Test Automation Framework with Behaviour-Driven-Development
Frontend/Backend Web Development to integrate the test automation framework with a visual interface and to assist the QA team with easily created automated reports
Code Reviewing and Mentoring in Python to help colleagues acquire improved Python skills and to ensure code quality

Experience.Jobs.Title: Self-employment
Description: Data Mining and Data Scraping
Scrap data from different target sources
Structure data into the desired format
Analyse data to create new connections

FeatureProjects.Title: Some Of My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Synk
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A web interface that enables users to manage their projects by providing tools for accounting and controlling. It is designed to simplify project management, reduce manual data entry and provide accurate financial information for decision-making.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Visual Similarity Explorer
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A web interface for visually analyzing and grouping large sets of images based on user-defined similarity. The system generates a 2D map of small image previews, allowing the user to select and group images. The groups can be further generalized and the feature and projection model is retrained, resulting in an updated image embedding. The process is iterative, allowing the user to continually refine their groups based on subjective similarity.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: 2D Adventure
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A 2D platform rogue-like game written in Unity where the player has to pass all levels to win. Each level provides multiple dangerous challenges which the player has to maneuver through. If the time runs out or the player dies, it counts as permanent death and leads to a complete restart.

OtherProjects.Title: Other Noteworthy Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Discord Bot
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A Discord Bot using the Discord API to automate the server management. It can send welcome messages to newly joined users and assign roles based on their emoticon selections in server messages.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Feature Builder and Runner (BDD)
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: User Interface to easily create Feature files for behaviour-driven development with drag and drop mechanics. It helps to create feature files in a standardized format and ensures valid syntax. Linked to a system, it can also trigger execution.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Arowana
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Python Framework for automated testing with behaviour-driven development which integrates with TargetProcess. It dynamically retrieves Feature files from Test Cases, provides the setup for execution and updates the results back to TargetProcess.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Image Stitching
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This project combines multiple photographic images with overlapping fields of view to produce a segmented panorama image. It implements the images acquisition, feature detection and description, image matching and lastly blending and composition.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Robotic Games Heist
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A Robotic Game where a thief robot needs to steal an item and leave the building successfully without getting caught by the guard robot. It is created and simulated in the Robot Operating System (ROS) framework.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Paradox Interactive Mod Translator
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An automated Translator using the Google mobile page to translate modded YML files for games from Paradox Interactive, specifically here for Imperator Rome.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to contact me, my inbox is always open. I will answer your email as soon as possible.
